hero.title: Self check-in that works for everyone
hero.subtitle: Reduce front-of-house congestion by letting guests join your waitlist themselves. Simple QR code scanning or kiosk check-in—no app downloads required.

sections.title: How self check-in works
sections.subtitle: Give guests control of their experience from the moment they arrive

steps.title: Scan QR code
steps.description: Display a QR code at your entrance. Guests scan it with their phone camera—no app needed.

steps.title: Enter details
steps.description: Guests enter their name, party size, and contact info directly from their phone.

steps.title: Get updates
steps.description: Instant SMS or email updates keep them informed of their place in line.

sections.title: Less chaos at the front door
sections.description: Stop juggling clipboards and handling lines. Let guests add themselves while your team focuses on hospitality.

bullets.text: No app downloads or account creation required
Works on any smartphone with a camera
Free up staff to deliver better service

sections.title: Or use kiosk mode
sections.description: Set up a tablet at your entrance for guests who prefer a dedicated station. Same easy check-in, different approach.

bullets.text: Works on any tablet—no special hardware needed

seo.title: Self Check-in
seo.description: Let guests join your waitlist with QR codes or kiosk check-in. No app downloads required.
